name: CreateCustomerBFUS
author: Fredrik Eriksson, Lundalogik AB
description: This app lets the user create a LIME Pro prospect customer in BFUS. It is also possible to update the customer once it has been created in BFUS. The app is a supplement to the big LIME Pro - BFUS integration where updates in BFUS are automatically sent to LIME Pro.

versions.comments: Added support for warning when saving an already integrated customer without having sent the update to BFUS.
Added support for update phone number with lookup on phoneid. No support for delete phone numbers, since not allowed by BFUS. If deleted in Lime phone number updates to empty in BFUS./JAS
